name: Isabel Martinez
description: Isabel Martinez is a 68-year-old retired school teacher from Argentina, who has recently started to explore online grocery shopping to simplify her weekly routines. With a reserved personality and a formal communication style, she approaches technology with cautious curiosity, driven by the need for convenience in her sedentary lifestyle. While she values detailed information and exhibits a strong adaptability to new experiences, she tends to feel impatient when faced with complex processes, making online grocery ordering a manageable yet innovative task for her.
